dcterms:description: A set of environments designed for multi-agent reinforcement learning, where agents interact in a continuous space and learn to cooperate or compete.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent Particle Environments (MPE)

dcterms:creator: Emanuel Todorov
Tom Erez
Yuval Tassa
dcterms:description: A physics engine for model-based control, used for simulating robotic tasks in a continuous action space.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent MuJoCo

dcterms:creator: Mikayel Samvelyan
Tabish Rashid
Christian Schroeder de Witt
Gregory Farquhar
Nantas Nardelli
Tim GJ Rudner

dcterms:description: A benchmark environment for multi-agent reinforcement learning, based on the StarCraft II game, where agents must learn to cooperate and compete in complex scenarios.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:description: A cooperative stochastic game randomly generated for the reward function and transition probabilities, designed for evaluating multi-agent learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Didactic Game
